upper_case: Password must contain at least one upper case character.
lower_case: Password must contain at least one lower case character.
number: Password must contain at least one number.
special: Password must contain at least one of these special characters: "'/~`!@#$%^&*()_-+={}[]|;:<>,.?\
not_met_requirements: Your password needs to be at least 8 characters long and contain at least 3 of the following: an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, another character (eg £!*%).
length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
original_hint_start: Hint: The password should be at least seven characters long. To make it stronger
